Question: Hangzhou Zheben Import and Export Co., Ltd. CES 2024 product highlight and specification
Summary:
Hangzhou Zheben Import And Export Co., Ltd.

CES 2024 Product Highlight:

- Manufacturer of various weighing scales including digital, body fat, luggage, kitchen, and bathroom scales
- Employing over 200 workers with an annual production capability of 3 million sets of electronic scales
- Exporting to America, France, Australia, Italy, and 20 other countries and regions
- ISO9001 Quality Management System Certification, CE, ROHS, BSCI Certification
- Emphasizing research, development, and innovation, with a series of new products recently developed
- Focus on product quality, using German technology and the best raw materials
- Offering reasonable prices, efficient production time, and good after-sales service
- Seeking cooperation with more customers for mutual development and benefits
